name: whoop
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give a loud, excited shout, especially to show your enjoyment of or agreement with something: The audience was whooping and clapping. See also
whooping cough

Idiom
whoop it up
a loud, excited shout, especially showing your enjoyment of or agreement with something: When the whoops and cheers had finally died down he started to speak.

to shout loudly and in an excited way: [ I ] I was so happy it was hard not to whoop out loud. whoop noun [ C ] us
